message: Hi Bob, I have a great product for you that I think you'll be interested in. I'm offering it to you for $90. Let me know what you think.
I'm interested in the product, but $90 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $70 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $70 is too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $85. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you say?
I understand that the product has value, but $85 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $75 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your continued interest in the product.  I'm willing to come down to $82.  This is really my final offer.  I'm confident you'll find this to be a good deal.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $82 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $78 for it.
